Name: Bernard Reis
Review: Completely frustrating experience. Paid extra money to get the air conditioner with connectivity, but it just doesn't work 9/10 times I try to use it. When it gets to connect to the device, it takes less than a minute to get disconnected again. Tried reinstalling the app, cleared the cache, reset router, replaced the router, but nothing works. Again, I'm completely frustrated.

Name: Gordon Inman
Review: Some good features, but this app isn't very smart. You would think once you connect to the device it would give the UI/UX for your specific device. I connected my new stove/oven, but the image used to represent my stove doesn't match my stovetop burner layout. The directions for the oven remote start are written generically to try to fit any product; "look to see if you have this." If they would put some effort into personalizing the experience to the device you purchased, I'd rate this higher.

Name: MrDurma
Review: This app works perfectly, it allowed us to download many more cycles for our Washer/Dryer. It really has cool features and we don't have any problems with it but there is one thing which is kind of bothering, in the Power Monitoring section it doesn't show almost any useful info about how much electricity has been consumed, it just shows "rating?" From 0 to 5. How are we supposed to know how much kWh is 1 and how much kWh is 5? That would make my rating and experience 5/5 :D

Name: K Kostas
Review: Good but not great for an app by LG. Not the most user interface friendly, and few adjustments by user. I downloaded it to add a washer/dryer extra cycles and it does not have some cycles that would be nice to have (like a soak cycle), they are just a bit different, and I can just have the same cycles by adjusting the temp and such on the existing ones.

Name: Greg Evans
Review: App is useful but limited and requires some updates. The WiFi setup took longer than it should, because the app was not clear about which button turned WiFi on. I had to reference the user's manual to turn on WiFi. I was using this app to use the smart analysis function. All tests pass, but I still have problems getting my new dishwasher to consistently complete a wash cycle. Ideally there would be a test for any component that is causing the dishwasher to stop.

Name: Ranelle Lucina
Review: I was able to connect to my lg appliances for the first few months. After an upgrade, all appliances show as disconnected, and I can no longer reconnect to my home wi-fi. 1/4/20 update: I emailed as requested, because after reinstalling the app, and resetting my router, I'm still not able to connect to all my appliances. There were a couple I was able to connect to, but it took several painful attempts. It keeps saying there are issues connecting with their servers.

Name: Tom
Review: LG air conditioning - Bugs are mostly fixed. I hope they don't break it again. Now if they would make the app actually useful. Please let me set temperature, mode and fan speed for scheduling. When I set repeating schedule I don't know what the temperature will be a week from now. There's no way to set it to all AUTO because this setting is pretty much useless. Time alone just doesn't cut it.

Name: Carlos Sanz
Review: It is not really helpful with my washing machine. Only predesigned programs can be chosen in the app and it does not let you make any modification of temp, spin and so on. It would also be nice to start a second program like spin or dry after washing, but for that you need to go back to your machine and select the remote start again... I just like receiving a notification when my laundry is done but, apart from that, not much value for washers...

Name: Yun Gi Jang
Review: Right now the app version is V3.0.1700001 and it seems that I can't connect my vacuum cleaner, at least for me it doesn't appear in the screen. However the app tells me that products like styler, oven, washer, including vacuum cleaner can only be added in standby mode, what does it mean?

Name: Ray Gozo
Review: So far so good. (For Washing Machines). Some minor glitches... Other than OK. What I would like to to see ADDED to the downloadable cycles (in future update) is more TIME OPTION for the TIME DELAY programme. Currently you can only set it up from 3 to 19 hrs. An 1hr time delay would help a lot. Thanks LG.

Name: Birdski Bird
Review: Wifi connectivity is horrible. I purchased a washing machine with wifi connectivity. This app is absolutely horrible at doing that. I have tried all the trouble shooting / router configurations that I could with this, and get an error that the machine is off, and there is no internet connection available. I will end up returning this machine and getting another competitor machine who's app will work. Get it together LG, I will not be a returning customer . All of my other wifi items work fine

Name: Noushin K
Review: The app as it stands, doesn't crash, and works, but alongside a WiFi apppliance has MAJOR shortcomings: 1) Can't turn on remotely!!!! If I have to manually press the on/off botton on applianaces, the wifi feature loses appeal.the app becomes more of toy that a tool. 2) doesn't allow you to setup a time to start any of my appliances. I should be able to set the timezone/time in the app, and then given it's connected to internet, the machine should be able to turn on at the specified time).

Name: Bob Rose
Review: Works Great! Didn't think I would like this app working with my washer and dryer as much as I have. It updated the software right away on both the washer and dryer, then has worked flawlessly. I'm able to monitor both while running, pause cycles, remote start, and best of all, get reminders when each load is finished and ready for attention.

Name: Sheena Pakanati
Review: Requires unnecessary permissions to run at all (location, phone calls). App won't launch without these permissions, which are irrelevant to the app's functionality. Update: The developer's response unfortunately does not make much sense. There are a number of other ways for the app to function without requesting or requiring these invasive permissions (and many other apps manage to do so). As others have noted, some other apps will ask for permissions and simply disable advanced features if the permissions aren't granted, but the LG app won't run at all even though none of its features *truly* require these call, media, location permissions. Hopefully LG will note the many customer reviews objecting to the permission requests and make some changes.

Name: Damien Hill
Review: When the app works its great, but half the time I find it doesn't connect to the wifi. I have checked my wifi and even when I'm receiving the best possible signal, it still won't connect to my TV. Instead I have downloaded the other LG app 'LG TV Plus' which I am guessing it's the same creator?

Name: Jason Powell
Review: App push notification does not work for letting you know when wash cycle is done. I think it's worked a few times when the cycle is actually done but most times it's hours later when you get the push. Remote start is a joke because you have to turn on remote start for you to be able to remotely start it.... Only reasons I got this washer and it doesn't work. Won't be buying any future lg products.

Name: Rebecca Shapard
Review: Pain in the butt to get washer and dryer connected to the app...App itself isn't very user friendly...App just suggested updating so I did the update...Went in the app to set up a delay wash cycle and it says that I don't have any appliances connected... Now I have to start the whole process over of getting connected to the app üôÑ

Name: Martin Petder
Review: Functional app that allows to run washing machine remotely with standard settings. Cannot modify programs like is possible on the machine itself, but can see the planned ending time of delay that is not possible on the machine. Too slow to get connection via cloud (has no direct connectivity) and quite often shows wrong information at the beginning so you have to wait for the update.

Name: Liliana Ruiz
Review: The app is kinda useless, unless you have to know exactly when your dishwasher is done. I was under the impression I could turn on the dishwasher from my phone and change the cycles. All I can do is see if the dishwasher is running and how much time is left. I haven't had any issues with the dishwasher yet, so I haven't had to use the customer support part yet.

Name: Adrian Macneil
Review: Super privacy invasive. Requires permission to view all your call history just to open the app. Fails to open the app if you reject it. Then it requires your date of birth to sign up. Completely unnecessary to require these. Edit: Developer response is unacceptable. It would be trivial to ask for my country rather than requiring invasive permissions such as viewing all call history.

Name: Joy Wallar
Review: This app is helpful with my dryer and was helpful with my washer. I don'tknow if its an app issue or a washer issue. I found that my frustration with my washer is not unique. It set-up with the app immediately after receiving the machine. It continue to work well for several days and then all the sudden, it disconnected and will not connect. My dryer has stayed stable with connection. I have tried the trouble shooting, resetting, uninstalling app, unplugging machine, etc. So frustrating.

Name: Milovan Predojevic
Review: AC interface wont start after the new update. Just giving me a msg Device wont start, try again later...I would go back to old app if appstore gives this option but no. Dont update the apps if it breaks how it has been working in the previous version. I ve tried reinstalling and restarting the app. Phone is Xperia UltraA1

Name: Luis NY
Review: App works kind of ok... Add appliances is very easy and so far it worked flawlessly... Adjusting the settings can be some challenging as it most of the times did not saved the settings on the first try... Washer, dryer (the ones I own) could have a better and longer usage history logs, including water usage, day and time it ran, along with the items it already logs, for the refrigerator a history of defrost, ice production and water usage also with the items already logged.

Name: bruce bradbury
Review: Almost completely useless! The only thing useful the app does is sometimes it let's you know the dryer is done. Sometimes! You can't turn the dryer on remotely which means you can't restart if you couldn't get the clothes out after the first cycle. Also, the dryer doesn't actually get the clothes dry with normal cycle. The dryer and the app are both a waste of money!

Name: John Landa
Review: Hire some decent programmers. At the very least publish a decent writeup that "works" for each product. I won't even get into questioning why the app needs the BS permissions it asks for. I have 4 major LG appliances. This fridge is the first with WiFi. This sad excuse of an app will make me rethink another LG purchase. --------------- Update After 3 go rounds with support over connection issues I am being totally ignored. Sent them every piece of info they requested. Crickets! 1 LOST CUSTOMER

Name: Greg
Review: Just purchased my LG LFX28566S. Downloaded the ThinQ app on my android and cannot get it to connect. Using a 2.4 network and it will reach 60% and then times out. I have tried a number of times with the same result. Very disappointed. Do I return the fridge as alerts are one of the reasons I purchased this product.

Name: mersudin saric
Review: With app is possible only to switch on and off the air conditioner. Other functions are not available because each time appears a message "try again to restore normal operation of device" and the app goes back to basic function: switch on/off and current temperature.

Name: BandarKeto
Review: 10/12/2019: For the last 3 days, cant even connect to the app, everytime i log in it says failed to connect to server. Update 1/19/2020: still same problem, contacted lg and no help whatsoever, telling me to reinstall despite telling them that i have done that several times and tried using the app on a different phone and still getting the same issue.

Name: Cyndy Cook
Review: Very good...once I made sure my refrigerator was registered. I had forgotten that I hadn't done so when I first got it so the diagnostics wouldn't perform. After going through the registration, the app worked perfectly! Within a matter of seconds, it was done and over with. Everything is in perfect running order, just the way it should be. Good app. Suggestion, tho...have a reminder at the beginning of the app to make sure products have been registered before using it.

Name: Chris Nesbit
Review: It is a very cool app to use with your various LG devices, but I feel the app could be designed better. The way everything is explained for the app could be better. I did not realize that more than one person could connect to it until I began experimenting with setting it all up again with someone else's phone.

Name: Mark Weeks
Review: Downloaded it to work with my LG TV and wouldn't connect for no reason, then randomly decided to connect. Sometimes it will connect to it and other times it won't. There's nothing wrong with the internet, TV, or my phone. I've followed all the steps to connect it to Alexa and that won't find it, even when it's connected. Rubbish app and a waste of time.

Name: Brendon Serack
Review: Unable to add tv. Tv says the phone was added. Phone gives me an error "the network information can not be sent to your tv. Connect to the same network as your tv.". It is the same network. As far as I can tell, it is impossible to add the tv to Alexa w/o this app.

Name: Bianca
Review: I really don't understand the need of so many authorizations and terms. I don't want to make an account or allow the app to have access to my personal information in my phone. I think I could have options in app if chosing country and langage for example. Even my partner approving and authorizing everything, we couldn't find the option we wanted the most as personalized cycles.

Name: Erik
Review: WAY, WAY TOO MUCH PERMISSIONS! Why does an app that I use to monitor my washer and dryer require permissions to view, modify or delete my phone contacts, read my SD Card contents, make phone calls, change network settings, turn network on if off... etc, etc, etc? Pretty far overreach here LG!

Name: Ratko Dakic
Review: Some time this app is not usable on android, when I want to set new temp for my AC always I got message to try again and app return me to home screen of this very bad app! On iphone this option working normal! Also, you must add option to schedule temperature at some part of day (auto change temp), now we can just auto power on/off AC but we can't set program to auto adjust temperature at some part of day like 08-12 - 23¬∞, 12-16 - 25¬∞, 16-08 - 20¬∞ etc. You must add this option!!!

Name: Krystian Wiatr
Review: I use this app mostly as TV remote. It's okay, but lacking some basic functionality. It cannot power on the TV - my alexa can do it. There is no keyboard - arguably the most important tv app feature. Roku app had that working 5+ years ago. Keep up the good work, and hopefully we will see some updates soon.

Name: Freddie Appleby
Review: Used to work with the washer with no issues. Then after the last update or so it just immediately signed me out and tells me my login details are incorrect. I use a password manager, so no they aren't but whatever I go and reset it and sure enough on the latest update we have the same situation again, signed out and needs reseting again. I shouldn't need to be logged in to just to use nfc anyway so uninstalled. Maybe they will fix it at some point.

Name: David Fridley
Review: I can't believe how hard it was to connect to my washer the first time. The written directions just left me guessing, but to be fair I did notice that the app was changing too a new wifi SSID to find and setup the washer. More progress information would give do better to set expectations. Never sit there and leave the user wondering what's going on for minutes. There's a red key crossed out on my washer. Makes me think it's missing the wifi security key - but then it couldn't be talking.

Name: datta sarma
Review: As usual LG never diappointed me. Please follow Cyndy Cook suggestion below review. Make sure your appliances are registered. Latest update (i have written this review on 12/22/2019) is perfect. My special request to LG is please include Energy Ctrl option in next update (80%, 60%, 40%) in ThinQ app please...This ensures no need of remote control in hand but we can control remotely with app. Thank you in advance for considering my request in next update.

Name: Slenda Mon
Review: Be neat if it worked more than twice! Kist keepa freezing not to mention the only way to truly exit the app is to force it to stop running in the background. no option in the app to use a keyboard in order to type on smart tvs within apps or say to sign in. Without that feature for tvs one is better off with the lg tv plus app, even though it also lacks the same thing.

Name: Claus Jensen
Review: Completely useless app. Wanted to use the Download Cycle for a Tag On machine. The cycles you can download are things like "Full load", "New clothes" etc. You cannot set or see what the temperature, spin cycle etc will be. In short, completely useless.

Name: J Chapin
Review: App won't even start. Complains that my phone is rooted, no idea why it cares. Edit: support admitted to me that their app is spyware, and tries to collect a list of installed apps. If you have root related apps installed, their app reports it and dies. Dev keeps insisting their spyware is acceptable. It's not, nor is it acceptable that they attempt to dictate what I do on my hardware.

Name: Grant Gould
Review: Required unreasonable permissions (all-time location, phone calls) refuses to run if they are not granted. My washing machine should not need permissions, and no app should be unable to run in a degraded mode without permissions. (per reply below: There's no reason the app should need to get country from sim rather than asking user, or indeed from the location permission it also asks for. Equally there is no reason it should not accept location-only-when-running rather than location-always. Especially for an app with ads, location-always and phone permissions are obviously unreasonable)

Name: Mathew
Review: server failed to connect, no response from the server. Try again later. App is useless, tried all the usual stuff like delete app cache/data, uninstalled and reinstalled, app has not worked in months due to error above, tried on home WiFi, 4g mobile data, no issues with other apps, using galaxy s10+. Also although I did allow access, why on earth does this app need telephone permission and location permission absolute joke of a app and company. Will never buy an LG product again.

Name: John Angelillo
Review: The app has been working fine the last couple of months they've worked out a few issues with the reconnection issues and that was very important because it was very frustrating so. So making that statement at this point I have to give it a 5-star rating!

Name: Emil Kreutzman
Review: Everything about this app feels a bit 2013 and non-polished. I guess it works, but it's not very slick or pleasing to use. Also, why does it show the weather?? Lowered review by one star because of all the additional permissions. Edit December 2019: apparently this app reads my location in the background. Great, 1 star.

Name: Jason Johnson
Review: Demands permanent access to Phone Calls and Location permissions at startup and refuses to run if permission is denied or restricted to when the app is running. Neither of these is necessary for any reasonable functionality of the app. Today my refrigerator quit working. It defrosted everything in my freezer. NO notification from the app. Manually running diagnostics in the app says everything is fine and working even though the freezer is currently over 40F when it should be 0F.

Name: Gerry Go
Review: App is disappointing. It lacks a lot of features I expected when I chose an LG combo washing machine with WiFi. My wishlist: 1. Better controls over the settings on remote start. 2. Notification on start of cycle when using delay end time 3. Logging of actual time from start to finish of washing and drying 4. Better energy monitoring. It should show the actual watt-hr usage instead of just icons. This feature is so useless that Ihad to use a separate power meter for this purpose.

Name: Bec Smith
Review: Very helpful, failed first attempt, but had to close fridge to restart diagnosis, then work properly and said nothing wrong, just fridge left open for to long it told us that the fridge had been open 41 times in the last day. Probably why nothing seemed cold.

Name: Michael Hewartson
Review: You set the washer and dryer for remote start by pressing a button on the machine. This renders the option almost useless. I essentially paid $200 extra for Wi-Fi capable appliances just to get an alert on my phone that a load of laundry is done.

Name: Jacob Sylvia
Review: Eh. It's not so great. With a washer and dryer it takes an extremely long time to get the values updated. The washer also drops offline all the time which makes the app completely useless but LG refuses to acknowledge the issue.

Name: Orland Louie Reyes
Review: This is below average compared to other competitors like Samsung. I bought the C9 assuming that their equivalent ThinQ has the capabilities to add family members to control LG devices. Unfortunately, this is not the case and have not found a workaround. Also, my voice assistant can't control the TV directly because it needs to go through a gateway (ThinQ) to accept commands.

Name: Lucas Araujo do Nascimento
Review: Horrible. I hoped that I could type the text at the app. But is just the same functions from the remote at the phone. At least I the voice could be available. 100MB and is worse than an IR app that I already use. Seriously... Should have bought another brand of TV. Have always been happy with Panasonic. Will go back to it at next TV.

Name: Michael Derhammer
Review: Product status is slow. It doesn't always connect. I logged out of the app and back in and lost all of my connected products! Also, still haven't found a way to do multi-user so my wife can use a separate account to monitor the same products. Horrible app. Will not be buying LG ever again. Worst application experience from what I use to consider a top-tier competitor in the appliance space.

Name: John C
Review: Spent over an hour, and can't get my new washer dryer to connect to the internet. They do connect to wifi, but without registering themselves to the LG server they delete themselves from the app. I have done everything I can think of on my end, disabling firewalls and such on my router, but nothing works. At least the machines work without the app. Edit: Still nothing working, and I am about to just give up on LG for future purchases.

Name: Vasilis Kounios
Review: App works fine but it can't connect with Google Home App! WHY??? Why should I unlocked my phone, launch the app and finally press the power button, instead of just saying one phrase??? Please be better and try to fix this!! It's not that big of a deal!!!

Name: doug mallett
Review: This app (and the LG wireless thermostat are junk. 1) when the power goes out the furnace shuts down and doesn't appear to restart. When the temperature drops down outside of acceptable the app doesn't notify me like NEST. 2) in the schedule section, you can chose on and off but not decide temperature. 3) the app schedule doesn't sync with the wall control. 4) when integrated with Google home, only power on or off functionality is retained. Save your money and invest in a NEST for the same pric

Name: mohammed o
Review: I was hoping to use this for my new lg washing machine. I get an error message saying that it cannot run on a rooted device. My device galaxy a70 is not rooted and I still get this message. Please fix this issue.

Name: Jason Nelms
Review: Rewriting: I ran out of space so I deleted fluff so I can say this app STILL SUCKS!. I finally got it to work in early November. Went to use it today and my appliances have vanished. Honestly, could not be more disappointed in an app, a customer service dept or a company as a whole. Truly regret my decision. Update: now the app will not even open. simply crashes at start up. And yes, i uninstalled and reinstalled. Absolutely nothing.

Name: Robert Burton
Review: This app is horrible! It is missing buttons to add appliances. The app itself crashes lot and the connection between appliances and the server is hit and miss. The app won't open with out talking to server. Why the ads, for product we paid extra for Wi-Fi connectivity, why have large ads in the App?

Name: Avi Kathuria
Review: Nice app that can help users in the way of smart diagnosis. But diagnosis error result having bug in case of top load washing machine. This is confirmed by LG support care as well that this app shows result of previous error state. Actual issue I'm getting in washing machine is dE i.e. door error, it says it might be opened or not working but in my case it closed and working fine. Thus washing machine is fine but app is not. Plese fix it developers....

Name: Villi Mag
Review: Edit: A year has gone since I gave my review of this app and the LG TrueStream washing machine. And still there's no wool program to be downloaded. This must be the most useless app and feature for a washing machine in washing machine history. Sales trick made to grab your money. What washing machine doesn't offer a wool program anyway? It's stupid. And the washing machine and this app doesn't even have a wool program. Neither preinstalled on the machine nor to download via the app.

Name: Szymon Buhajczuk
Review: The app no longer works due to overreaching permission requests. Since the update it requires permissions to make calls (which I refuse). Most apps simply disable features if you deny permissions to specific things. This one won't launch *at all* if you deny it ability to make calls. In my case this app is used to notify me when my dishwasher cycle is complete. Why on earth would I allow it to make calls? Their statement says its used for "smart diagnosis" and customer support calls

Name: Michael Frame
Review: Used to work fine then had a repair done by lg under warranty and it lost connection to app try setting it up again but says product is not supported. Zero help from lg and not even a reply from app developers. Without having the app you cant even just put it on a rinse and spin cycle

Name: William Rivera
Review: Garbage, I've been trying for months to add my SK9000PUA 55 inch led tv and there is always an error, at first the app worked but then it deleted the tv of the list of appliances, now I can't add it again, this app is a total waste of time.

Name: Van Der Leigh
Review: Initially rented 2 stars, then had to downgrade to 1 star. Every time when router is power cycled, the WiFi module fail to connect in auto mode, , thus resulting.un.near zero availability. Absolutel awful application. Connects to the aircon intermittently. Frequently cant connect due to server unavailability. when connected, works well, thus 2 stars. otherwise I'd rate it only 1 star. expected to get something better from a reputable LG brand. Raw and unfinished when compared to competitor.

Name: Janna Oakfellow-Pushee
Review: Although it may sound silly to some, I actually enjoy the polite notification that my Washer and Dryer hit me up with. It cheers me with the little song at the end of each cycle as well. The notification from them also helps me remember to flip said laundry in the first place; a reminder I sorely need in today's busy world.

Name: June Seah
Review: Whenever i receive the message that notify me of the the completed wash cycle, i tried to click the notification to proceed with a rinse cycle. But it always takes a long time for the app to load. By the time i get into the app, the washer is already switched off. I have to do it manually. Is there any workaround/updates?

Name: Amanda Fancher
Review: This is a good app. It works well, but you can customize how you want you laundry washed. You can only pick from the factory settings and can't change things like water temp, extra rinse, etc

Name: Shagen Oganyan
Review: Definitely needs work. No ability to remotely turn on the washer and/or dryer. For certain drying cycles, constantly receiving server connection error messages. No way to adjust the settings through the app on existing cycles (e.g. change the dryness level, adjust drying time under the Time Dry option, etc...). Definitely would not recommend unless the dev teams make so major usability updates!!

Name: Jan Streit
Review: In current version app doesn't show current consumption of the electricity in Air Condition setting (monitoring). Previous UI was much better. Additionally app (account) cannot be link to Google Home. It doesn't work almost an year and LG really doesn't care to much. Therefor I cannot recommend to buy LG product anymore.

Name: Chris Cavanaugh
Review: App is a necessity. My dishwasher was having issues and would stop during cycles and I would need to restart it. Sometimes it would not start at all. To diagnose the issue I installed the app and the dishwasher automatically did a firmware update. It is working fine now.

Name: Brenton Faddis
Review: It's not linking to alexa very well! Ever since their last stupid system update last week whenever I ask lg to change to a hdmi number on their smart tv IT JUST PULLS UP WHAT TIME THE HDMI NUMBER IS ON TV FOR GOOGLE SEARCH RESULTS on the tv via alexa! And it was working just fine beforehand! I am disgusted that now I cannot ask it to change to a tv input via voice!

Name: Michael Harrison
Review: The app doesn't keep time with the washer and dryer. And I can't remote start the washer snd dryer!! WTH! So to me the extra hard earned dollars I spent on the WIFI option is just a fancy remote buzzer to let me know when the cycle is done... USELESS waste of money

Name: Gunther Meier
Review: Expected more from this app. Seeing the appliance but still stating that WiFi is unstable. Clearly LG needs to review this issue as it renders this app useless. All other appliances and devices are working fine, just LG that has missed the plot. LG fix your app! No wonder your brand is losing customers!

Name: Stephen Maskrey
Review: The app should be much better than it is, the app does not stay connected to the washer, and you would think you could change the water temperature of different wash programs, the machine is good but lg have been very lazy

Name: Eric Castro
Review: Did what the instructions told me to do held the phone to the smart logo on the top right of my refrigerator held my phone to it pushed the freezer button in for 3 seconds sound went off and my refrigerator still didn't connect I tried it several times and it doesn't work. I have a LSXS26466S

Name: Matt Pacey
Review: Last update has stopped all notifications!! When my front load wash has finished i don't get notifications to my mobile anymore. Have not changed any settings & all are correct. Your app is now useless to me unless a fix update is sent through, please fix!!

Name: Narongphisit Worawiwat
Review: air condition control on app don't have sleep mode for plus temp+1¬∞c and cann't fix time to turn off and don't have function light off and don't have energy control and don't have function auto clean font washer machine cannot power on and control by app but must be open remote control function on device before front wash can not start and control if don't open function on machine before

Name: Tina Bates
Review: App is somewhat useful. I wish you could choose your own options on the washer (such as water temp) when making selections on the download washes. Also, sometimes the app is really buggy, I've had to disconnect the the appliance and reconnect to the app twice per my call to LG for assistance.

Name: Richard Rouzeau
Review: Too limited. When you choose a cycle, you can't change any options. That's additional to the fact that, every single time, you need to turn the washer AND Remote Start option on for it to work with the app.

Name: gary meerkreebs
Review: Ruined because of the ads. You pay a ton for the appliances and the last thing you want to see is ads. I want functionailty snd its not too much to ask to remove the ads. Love the appliances and avoid the ap for this reason

Name: Lukman Hakim Sudjadi
Review: This app makes my life easier. It can be connected to google home service, so I can turn on or off my aircon with voice command. And when my device had a problem, it proved to be useful in helping me to find what's causing it.

Name: mohammad daoud
Review: Spent over two hours, and can't get my new washer & dryer to connect to the internet. They do connect to wifi, but without registering themselves to the LG server they delete themselves from the app.I registered them both on LG, I used same email to make an LG account. I have done everything I can think of on my end, disabling firewalls and such on my router, but nothing works. Please fix the app

Name: Libor Weidinger
Review: can not install the app, crashes allways! the app is incredibly large! !!! >:( after few tries to install, was successful. not bad app, all-in one, so I've uninstalled the LG Smart TV remote controller app.

Name: Francois Visscher
Review: Have tried to connect this app to my LG 55" smart 4k TV and it picks it up but never manages to add the device to my device list. Tried it with different phones as well. Currently using a Samsung s10+. My experience is the app is buggy and pretty much useless if I can't connect my devices

Name: BB MAGEE

Name: charles garalis
Review: Slow to load. And not real clear on uses. Great feedback on maintenance. But have yet been able to use it for anything except to tell me when a cycle has ended

Name: Juan Ortiz
Review: I have the problem with my refrigerator and the app tell me that everything is right. The temperature is bad, when I check the smart diagnostic said, everything is good.

Name: Stephen Quao
Review: When connecting to washing LG washing machine the app is reliable but when connecting to LG thin Q TV app is unreliable. I am using a mesh WiFi network at home, washing machine is connecting all the time but TV is working only sometimes.

Name: Nathan Joly
Review: Horrible app. Can't log into it no matter what I do with it. Have reset my password multiple times. Used email and registered name. Feels like I'm losing out on functionality that I paid extra to have. 3 LG TVs, 2 LG soundbars, LG Washer and dryer,

Name: Teressa Cornish
Review: I don't seem to be able to download a guide thta tells you what the cycles are before you pick them. So you have to go through uploading each one to your machine to know temperature and time length.

Name: Alnoor Macklai

Review: Keeps pushing alerts all day and night that "the app is now running" despite having all notifications turned off in the settings. Had to block them in the Android system settings. Otherwise works ok.

Name: Adrian Chong Len Cham

Name: a bhardwaj
Review: Worst ever experience both with machine and this app.Both r not working .If this is happening on installation of washing machine today I.e.28th dec 2019 ,only god knows how many times I need to call technicians . I received a replaced washing machine on 8th Jan 2020 Today on 9 jan 2020 finally a technician got it installed and luckily its functioning well.To lessen my fear I had taken AMC worth rs 3400 and hope all goes well.Now I will give 5 stars to this diagnosis.

Name: Lawrence Wachter
Review: Ok, but needs some improvement. Would be nice to change push notifications only when I am home by using geofencing or same WiFi to tell me when washer or dryer is done. I do not need to know about others washing clothes when I am out of the house.

Name: Jonathan Dibble
Review: Unable to login to my LG account. "ID or password is not correct". Can login to my LG account on laptop browsers and mobile phone browsers. Just the app that cant handle it. No use whatsoever.

Name: Mark Aldrin
Review: Terrible apps. And terrible washer. Terrible Dryer. LG WASHER DOESN'T EVEN USE ENOUGH WATER. That mean said, when washed with water, and when I dry it, it always stinks. Dryer doesn't even dry the clothes which even makes it more worst. LG, YOU MIGHT WANT TO REPROGRAM YOUR WASHER TO PUT MORE WATER.

Name: Chris Padilla
Review: Terrible app experience. The delay for connecting to your dryer is unbearable. App notifications leave little to be desired but they are functional which is why I gave it two stars.

Name: Dylan Arthur
Review: Work terrible. I do not recommend this app. The app shows that my dryer is connected, but when I go to the settings, I cannot control it. Called customer service and they have no idea what to do. Very unhelpful. customer service states that they have never seen anything like this before

Name: Jason F
Review: Sucks as it will not run on a rooted device. Update, got it running on a rooted device. There is no security threat from my device being rooted, what a load of baloney.

Name: Yuri McPhedran

Review: I have to uninstall this buggy app and reinstall about once a week. Which means I have to reapprove all the permissions, fix all the poor default settings, and reconnect to my TV.

Review: I installed the app to connect it with a LG fridge. After multiple tries and 2 accounts created on different platforms the app failed to connect with the product. LG products are pretty bad at UI/UX and this app confirms it (I own a LG tv also).

Name: Neil Chand
Review: Wifi connectivity for my washer dryer is pointless. Have to manually turn on the appliance, and when it turns off it stays off. Cannot turn on appliances remotely. Definitely a disappointment.

Name: Pat Tennies
Review: Terrible app. Would not connect, because there is a wall between my router and the washer. I cannot move my router to the utility room!!

Name: Robert Latham

Review: The process of adding a new device could greatly be improved. It is cumbersome and frustrating. Also, Google assistant support is limited for now, meaning that it doesn't work right now in my country.

Name: Kar Lo

Name: Angelito Zamora
Review: Easy to use but what is the exchange/ I have a lg window unit it says to use the exchange regularly in the maintenance instructions

Name: T Day
Review: Nice app, especially to let you know to when a cycle is done.

Name: Charles Salvador
Review: It says my device is not compatible for NFC Function. Please fix it.

Name: Karun Keshav
Review: I have lg front loading washing machine FHT1208SWW but why should not connect with mobile wifi and hotspot directly like as led smart tv,without wifi routers?

Name: Ashwini Kumar
Review: Stupid app, can't connect to my side by side LG refrigerator.

Name: James Wilson
Review: Good app, helps me keep in touch with all my appliances!

Name: Tetoianu Adrian- Catalin
Review: sp bad...2019 almost 2020 and this is still 2013 app...long story short only in US and UK you can intergrate the app with Alexa...

Name: Brian Dunne
Review: Won't connect to Alexa in Ireland because of geographical restrictions

Name: Jim D
Review: Super helpful! Love knowing when things are done!
