Uninstalled app, reinstslled, cleared cache and app data. Looking at comments I can seen this app has been having issues for a while. This app is used with all of the newer LG appliances so I cant understand why LG would not put more effort in this

Name: marjorie golden
Review: Just installed this app and it does not work for what I need. I wanted to customize one particular cycle and the app never gave me the ability to do that. It's bad enough I really hate this washing machine and dryer system, but  to offer an app that is basically useless, is a sham.

Name: Pol Alejandro
Review: very useful. using it with dual cool ac. although sometimes it doesnt always connect to the appliance. you have to try several times. suggestion for improvement: a confirmation button when turning on the appliance would be mighty useful to avoid powering on by accidental tap.

Name: Ciprian Ciubotariu
Review: Useless permissions required. I do know where the fridge is, so why would this app need my location? Another question is why it wants to make phone calls. Who is it going to call? Verdict: data gatherer. Uninstall. Users should be allowed to enter needed info instead of being denied the entire app if LG cannot see their photos. Why was your choice to not allow manual config?

Name: St√©phane Lam
Review: Works great to control my mini split wall unit. Though, requests could be a bit faster and some of the functions can't be controlled from this app, such as turning off the light indicators. Overall, it's a helpful app.

Name: suketchikitsune :3
Review: forgets devices a lot, I've got two smart LG TVs one oldish, one new, it adds and controlled them individually really well, flawless to be fair, but it constantly forgets devices, i have to search, re-add, verify security handshake number between phone and tv, then next day either both or one of the tvs has vanished... shame, I've had to uninstall and go back to the good old clunky lg tv app.

Name: Ivan Russell
Review: This app does so little that it's not really worth downloading. Setup was problematic. If you already have a Google account registered, you can't seem to share the dishwasher stairs unless you create a non-Google account and then share that out.

Name: Dan Valentine
Review: Error code displayed during the wash cycle, but the washer will only send data to this app after the cycle is over.  At that point the app told me the load inside the washer was uneven, but since the cycle had already finished that information was completely useless.    App is hard to find on my phone because the app installs itself as SmartThinQ instead of LG SmartThinQ, so it doesn't show up in a search for LG apps.

Name: ZacTAG MC
Review: Horrible app left to die. It's inability to link with the Google Home app is just appaling. I've planned to create a smarthome ecosystem after buying a 4K LG TV with ThinQ AI, thinking i could use my Google Home speaker for voice activation. I also bought an LG Aircon with Wifi to connect to the ThinQ app for Google Home automation but now i can use voice command because LG devices refuse to show up in the Google Home app and the ThinQ app refusing to link. Utterly disappointed! Singapore region

Name: Adam Goodale
Review: I never write reviews, but to control my AC from work is such a nice feature. One issue I have is when switching to Energy Saver from Cool or vise versa, it changes the set temp to 60 degrees regardless what it was at so you have to fix it. Fix that one issue with the app and you have my 5 stars.

Name: Randy Skelton
Review: works great didn't think I would use this app but it is really handy to know where in the cycle machine is at and sends us notification when finished we put this app on both of our phones .our wt7300cw is so quiet we hardly know it's running hopefully it will last a lot longer than our former get he toploader which sounded like a twin huey during spin cycle

Name: James McCoy
Review: LG SmartThinQ constantly crashes on my LG G7 ThinQ phone. After clearing data, cache, uninstalling, reinstalling, power cycle, with no third party security or battery saver apps, it crashes right after i approve permissions. Before I uninstalled the app, i was receiving notifications but tapping them would crash the app.

Name: blakaeg
Review: I used to be able to use Tag On with my LG washing machine. Suddenly the Tag On doesn't work the phone doesn't pick up any signal from the washing machine. Tried two Android NFC phones and non work. Don't know if machine has developed a fault or if the latest software update has affected my Tag On function. Not happy.

Name: Susan Blake
Review: ok, so some reviews say its awful. it wont switch on the tv but im happy about that because it wont have to be on standby. It was a fiddle to get it sorted but if i can do it at my age im sure younger people will find it a breeze. As long as you say "Alexa, ask LG tv to ..... and give your command, Alexa will do it. cool.

Name: Jonathan Sfrengeu
Review: Application no longer alerts you when the washer or dryer has finished a load. Notifications stopped working around 5/18 all of a sudden. Edit 6/2 - reinstalling the app fixed the above issue. Now if i could just be allowed to start my dyer again after it completed a load remotely these would be perfect.

Name: Kaya Skar
Review: After multiple false starts that turned out to be due to mistyped wi-fi password (an error that is revealed only on your next attempt to connect a device), my washer is now added to the app. It still showed as disconnected for a long while while I mashed the wi-fi button. Then it randomly decided to work. Seems okay if a little clunky, very few default options, have to download a cycle just to use the dryer.

Name: Aaron Guimond
Review: Great air conditioner but app is garbage. Doesn't work. Doesn't connect. It has a 3.8 rating for a reason. Annoyed because app control was a selling feature. Should have read the reviews first. That 3.8 would have been a big red flag. Thank God for the reliable 1990s technology remote.

Name: mechado king
Review: poor connectivity with device. too bad, the features look promising. Update: app is now more stable after update.

Name: James King
Review: bought new washer & dryer and love them, but if i get one more notice of server connection error and this app automatically closing everytime i open it, in less than 2 seconds and without me being able to read the notices or access information in the app in an "offline" mode then im going to pull my hair out. This is RIDICULOUS. Not worth the frustration of setting it up nor trying to use it. and yes I did get it setup after 3.5 hours and yes I am an IT guy who is knowledgeable of how it works.

Name: Norman Lee
Review: app keeps crashing after launch. it prompts "failed to connect to server" then the app crashes after i dismiss the notification.

Name: Darren Ryan
Review: Why are my products tied to my device and not my account? That's ridiculous!

Name: mmrs muzamil
Review: Good aap and easy to use

Name: Hemant Chiplunkar
Review: The latest app does not even open. The app 3-4 updates before was working fine. This is with respect to my LG A/C which is wifi enabled.

Name: Mike and Brenda Ouellette
Review: cant even get it to add my washer and dryer. It did make it past the searching screen twice(step 2) on the dryer only and got all the way to 100% complete and then said it didnt register. Very disappointed as I have all smart lights, thermostat etc, so obviously setup isnt beyond me but this is ridiculous. edit-able to add to work iphone but not my personal android

Name: A Google user
Review: Don't waste your time. Poor connections. Can't create cyles for washer or dryer. Can only download the "one" cycle they have in the app. Too many permissions. App does not need access to location, phone calls, or any accounts.

Name: David Cottrell
Review: P to the O to the S. You have to log in to the ThinQ account. Then it wants to switch to an LG account where you have duplicate everything you did for the ThinQ account. Whereupon it sends you back without allowing you to register the product in an endless loop of uselessness. Thanks LG. Never get that 30 minutes back.

Name: angela berry
Review: UPDATE JULY 8 2019 SO THAT FIX DIDNT WORK . NOR can I control the machine remotely!!! They market there products to be smart. NOT SMART!! so LG just responded saying there is an option to turn bluetooth off in the settings of the app . NO THERE IS NOT THERE IS AN OPTION TO TURN OFF OR DISABLE WIFI AND BLUETOOTH NOT JUST BLUETOOTH IF I DISABLE WIFI THEN THE WASHER WILL NOT ALERT ME . GARBAGE APP AND IRRITATING RESPONSE FROM LG . Do you not know how your app functions why can you not fix this

Name: Mark Milburn
Review: This app is terrible I am unable to get it to connect to my internet or my air conditioner with the inverter just absolutely horrible experience. Hard to believe a company that's large and was so much engineering can't do a better job. I may return the product.

Name: Junk Mail
Review: No! I should not be forced to give location access to verify my wifi connection and definitely not access to making calls and call settings to verify my country and language preferences. Will be returning my air conditioner because I can't use the advertised feature without accepting these ridiculous permissions.

Name: Glen H
Review: Well, I will guarantee that if nothing else in the app works the 40% of the home screen dedicated to ads will work. So 1 star is deserved for providing weather ads and ways to buy Amazon replenishment products. The less important part of the App is getting your personal information and sharing that with 3rd parties. The last part is if you care to get useful info from and control your appliance then LG collects everything but gives you crumbs. This app isn't for you but for LG. Uninstall!

Name: Johnson
Review: Extremely buggy. Washer keeps saying product registration failure after 'succesfully' registering Refrigerator cant get past step 1 as after clicking Yes, it will prompt me to do LG Switching Account, which I tried and it tells me the account is registered with Google. So I just go back between these 2 actions to no end.

Name: Dan Bollendorf
Review: I like the ability to see and control my appliances over the wifi but as long as you can only have one user on the app I can't give it a good review. I buy $20 smart plugs that allow me to add multiple users on the app but LG can't handle something that should be a basic feature.

Name: Van TroI
Review: In my AC, I can't create our modify any schedule operation after update. it says "please retry for normal operation".

Name: Jonathan Geer
Review: remote start is a joke. why do i have to put it in Tempe start EVERY single time, that renders this feature useless.

Name: Kamala Dharan
Review: Love this app! So helpful

Name: Mohammad Akmal Shah
Review: Excellent app to control the washer

Name: A Google user
Review: I bought a 2018 LG TV and I can not link it up to the app and thusly can't link it up to Google home. After researching, you can ONLY add a TV to the app if you live in USA! The rest of the world does exist and we are NOT happy. I'm just going to keep it simple and return the TV back to the shop. Where it really belongs

Name: Nathan Lankford
Review: It let me know when the dishes were done and how long it will take. That's good enough. No you cant hit a button and change the settings (via the app) after the dishwasher has started but who really needs to(control freaks). No it doesn't load and unload the dishwasher for you but who really expects that(quit binge watching Netflix get up and do it yourself). overall I'm happy it lets me know when its done how its doing and how long it will take to be finished.Thanks LG

Name: Beck Cahill
Review: This app disconnects constantly from all devices. When attempting to reconnect, it takes me through the registration screen then blanks out. I've contacted LG support and followed all reconnection options including uninstall/reinstall. It's temperamental frustrating and currently, completely pointless. Dont bother until you see some consistant positive reviews.

Name: Nathaniel Bupp
Review: Updated to new version last week and stopped getting notifications for both washer and dryer, even though notifications are turned on. I have to actually open the app to get the Push Notifications to pop up. The app also keeps turning on my Bluetooth without my permission.

Name: Scott W
Review: Sometimes I get notifications, other times I don't. When checking time left, the app says my washer is off/not connected to the internet, but I hear the washer finish and the notification pops up. What gives? It can't be off and on at the same time!

Name: Joe Yang
Review: Hi LG, after updating the app, i could not able to join one of the Air-con wifi units to home router, the error shows "network is full." The rest of thr Air-con units are okay. Is there a way to hard-reset network setting at Air-con via AC remote or hard button?

Name: Antiqas 86
Review: verry unintuitive washer options. 5 steps to get to what you want, plus what if I want to rince and spin only, but NOT at 1400rpm. Most options are not available to change.m. Also officially does not run on rooted devices. Not that anyone who has enough knowledge to root not know how to bypass that but why LG?

Name: Aaron Greenblatt
Review: Nice to get notifications when the wash is done. But if the phone is in sleep mode for a while and the wifi turns off, then the notifications don't seem to come through until you turn your phone bank on. Problematic

Name: Amit Gupta
Review: This is the worst app I have ever encountered. It not letting you signed in through any standard id say google or Facebook and when you try to sign up for then it not let you to select dob, and without that you can not sign up. So LG should have done atleast one round of QA before launching it. If the very first functionality is not working how can yiu release it for the use of customer. Very disappointing..

Name: Johan Persson
Review: Poor execution and poor integration with the hardware. Also there is no justification for not allowing the app to run without its privileges. Why on earth should you know where I am when I use the app. And no, the explanation in the app is not valid. The app does provide some basic extra features for our washing machine though.

Name: Jacob Haley
Review: I am in utter disgust that the method chosen by the developers to determine system memory is through access to photos. Nobody in their right mind should find this acceptable. The instant I learned of this I cancelled my delivery of my new refrigerator and I uninstalled the app. Regardless of whether or not anyone has interest in my personal pictures,it is the principal of the matter.I see there are many other like minded people and I would think the devs would take the hint.

Name: Gaurav Agrawal
Review: no easy to use....needs a lot of update. didnt expect lg to launch an app which doesnt even work properly with the hardware(fridge)

Name: Itzik Shabtay
Review: I accidentally chose the wrong region upon account creation and there's no way to change it. Now google assistant won't work with it.

Name: Carter DuBois
Review: Before I can even open your app I HAVE TO allow permissions for sharing my location and allow your app to make and manage phone calls on my cel phone? Guess what, my reply is a loudly yelled no! My refrigerator foes not need to call anyone. I have a feeling that Google is behind this additional attempt to control one's life. My next move will be to delete this app and call LG support for options.

Name: Aaron Nicely
Review: Requires log in information. Why would you need that to use a feature on the washer. wish I could use the feature, but I am not 'logging on' to do so. I bought your product, you don't need anything else from me. I may think twice about buying a product that requires a log in and more information about me and where I live and what I do.

Name: Olly Poulter
Review: Decent washer dryer, terrible app on Android. Cycle download doesn't work at all. Connectivity is unreliable so wash status isn't updated. Energy usage function also doesn't work at all. Hopefully updates pending to fix issues, otherwise not worth bothering with.

Name: Alexandra Kelly
Review: claims that my smartphone isn't "NFC equipped" so it wont even let us add our new washer and dryer as devices. Also, troubleshooting directions for using "Smart diagnosis" on our dishwasher (less than a year old) refers to buttons that don't exist... considering this function was a big factor in our decision to buy these, it's incredibly disappointing. The app wouldnt work with my old iPhone 6SE and now, doesnt work with our Huawei P30 or P20 lite.

Name: Amber C
Review: Love this App! I can monitor my appliances, start my machines and it alerts me if something is wrong. They also started this new service on some where they proactively let you know when you need to perform maintenance and stuff. It is so cool. Never thought my appliances could do this stuff.

Name: Teddy Lenis
Review: I bought a toc toc LG refrigerator and the manual says I could see the power consumption and how many times the doors were open and other stuff, but nothing of this was true, I can see only the temperature and change it, but either I can't change to Celsius instead farenheit

Name: Julio Ort√≠z-USA
Review: I do not know what is happening with the services offered by LG with your app; I have tried to make use of it but it says that it is not possible to continue with the configuration process because there is no communication with the server ... they are already two days old and I still have the problem.

Name: Peter Kruithoff
Review: very interesting way to diagnose problems with this household appliance. When we can literally communicate with the devices in our home and control things remotely... it really shows the advancement of our species. As far as the functionality of the refrigerator and its diagnostic system, it worked rather well. I'm pleased with the scope of the capabilities of this usually mundane home fixture. very cool.

Name: Billy Burger
Review: this app is useless. unable to control washer remotely. You actually have to power on the washer or dryer and then push the remote activation on the apliance before you can use "remote start". what a total waste of money. Tech support is also useless. They are unable to communicate effectively or to resolve issues relating to the the app.

Name: Zac Chua
Review: Very bad! The app doesn't connect to the dehumidifier - MD19GQGA1. Tried multiple times with different phones and login. Even have the retailer to do a home visit to fix it. The app is just not cutting it. The dehumidifier is connected to wifi (2.4Ghz as recommended on LG instruction manual) but app kept repeating that the registration failed. Even more ridiculous is the recommendation to set the dehumidifier next to the router (which we did by the way), how weak can the receptivity be?!

Name: J
Review: There's no reason that this app needs location and phone access to do it's job. 1 star for being deceptive about the permissions requirements.

Name: Tom Carr Jr
Review: Pushes advertising. Why buy an appliance that sends you advertising?

Name: Raffy R.
Review: Always says failed to connect to server even though I have good internet connection üòí

Name: Jeremy Petty
Review: The September 11 update has broken the app. LW1017ERSM Air Conditioner always shows OFF in the app and turning it on sets the unit to 60 degrees on Cool mode. Energy Saver mode isn't accessible because once you select at and change the temperature it goes break to Cool mode.

Name: Andy Wilson
Review: OK app, but very annoying with the same pop-up message every week or so about oven spills being easier to clean up while they are fresh. If you are going to annoy me with messages, at least provide some variety.

Name: Joshua W
Review: Why does this app require location, phone, and photos just to start? There is zero justification for this. My mini split ac was borderline on ok and with the demands of this app, my feelings about it are now negative. I wouldn't buy another invasive LG product ever again.

Name: justin might
Review: The notification telling you it's done seems like the only useful feature after 3 days of use. comes in handy as we cant hear the washer and dryer in our hom because it's so quiet. overall pretty cool seems to need a little work still to function smooth.

Name: Dave F
Review: Brand new 49SK8100PLA TV, followers the instructions for setup, now what? You're instructions state "after completing registration your TV will NOT be listed in the SmartThinQ app" so what's the point? So doesn't show connected TV so the app does nothing!

Name: M Sull
Review: Too many permissions! I installed, read the privacy policy and promptly uninstalled before setting up an account. The very small amount of convenience the app might provide nowhere nears the amount of privacy you are giving up, no matter what the LG Company wonk who replies in these reviews says.

Name: Greg Chute
Review: I have 2 Lg heat pumps at a remote location. I control 1 heat pump with this app and the other 1 with Sensibo app the Sensibo is much more superior then then Lg its quicker and never times out and tells exact tempture and humidity instead of saying low temp. and is more user friendly and cheaper then the Lg(hard to find) module you need to buy for the Lg app.

Name: J C
Review: app constantly has issues connecting to ac and refrigerator despite being three feet from the router. connectivity with google assistant is horrid and needs to be reset once a day. a disgusting effort that makes me want to return my quite refrigerator and guarantees I wont by the smart stove I was going to purchase.

Name: Margaret Gregory
Review: I like the custom downloadable cycles and the ability to know it is done on my phone, but remember to turn on the remote start each time I power on the washer or dryer is frustrating. Make it remember the setting or connect automatically and this app would have 5 stars from me.

Name: tina Reid
Review: love this! I love that it let's me know when to clean the tub and when the cycle is done.

Name: Ant D
Review: Unable to login into my LG account. The app might work brilliantly but as I can't login I can't find out.

Name: Robert Martinez
Review: per my owners manual my model has wifi capability. when I download the app, it only tells me it can do diagnostics of the dishwasher. what a waste of my time. I was convinced when buying this model I could download cycles to the machine. there are options for that ok n my app. I am very disappointed.

Name: Franco Di Giandomenico
Review: this is my rating 0. too intrusive. you ask to have access to almost every function in the phone, and you need very little. you have to restrict yourself to only those services in the phone that are needed to communicate with the appliances.. So I am removing this app.

Name: Gary Tessman
Review: Piece of junk app. it won't find any of my wall mount AC units after router reboot. I have to delete my 3 wall mount units, shut the main breaker off my HVAC unit just so it can find and see them again to re-add to the network! Horrible app!

Name: A Google user
Review: The app is a little weird at first but its works well enough. Washer and dryer Wi-Fi connected in under 10 minutes. LG should work closely with more home automation systems.. I had to reset my Alexa devices to get the LG Alexa skill to work..

Name: Jason Platt
Review: It works-ish with my air-conditioning , but not particularly well. Getting product status is very slow. The sub screen that shows target temp and unit status never shows anything, and the settings below that are not finished. It does integrate with Alexa reasonably.

Name: James Petersen
Review: tl;dr - LG has managed to develop an IoT platform that lacks everything that makes the Internet of Things powerful.  If you're considering an internet-enabled appliance, I would recommend NOT going with LG's SmartThinq platform.   This app is as basic as it gets. Shows my washer and dryer, and ony updates the status after having the app screen open for at least 30 seconds (I know this because the status doesn't update until after the screen has dimmed). Push notifications often fail to show up (yes, I've disabled battery management and other Android issues that can block notifications), and even when they do show up, there's no action that can be triggered by them.  The ONLY use for this app is to ask Google how much time is left on my laundry. Flash your smart-home's lights when it's done? Not possible. Integrate with IFTTT? Only if you're in the United States (and even then, I can't speak to its utility, since I'm not).  There is no support for third-party integrations (e.g. API access for non-partners), this app is nearly useless, and the incredible power of the internet to connect things and make them talk to one another is actively ignored by LG.

Name: Velimir Kojic
Review: Include English language in all countries. Translation is very poor, mixed with English (sometimes 3 languages are mixed, depending what country/language you choose). Also, limiting account that account can be registered only in one country is not OK. Why?

Name: Ravinder Singh G
Review: Good Product App , but should be Optimized for fast access of app with product. As the App has a bit slow/laggy access , even on a High Speed Wifi (100Mbps) connection. But overall its very useful with all LG wifi products controlled and monitored in single app from anywhere. Thanks to LG.

Name: Richard Sutherland
Review: Not fully customisable. Tried it for my LG washing machine. Wanted only spin cycle, nothing else but could only select pre-determined cycles. All I wanted was a 1400 RPM spin, no previous rinse etc. There are a number of suggested cycles one can download but none further customisable.

Name: FatzLea
Review: Fun & easy to use. Just wish I had an app to load my washing machine & do the detergent. Lmao. Thanks LG.... Dont hope to have to use smart diagnosis anytime soon. But I have checked the machine & the door was open & that was the diagnosis the app gave me. Great App! Please let customers know that this is the app to use & not LG Smart Laundry & DW global app.

Name: Shahadat Hossain
Review: Size is too big and not work with google assistant Says not available in Bangladesh

Name: FLY The Band
Review: I just bought the WT7200C LG washing machine and wow, what a nightmare! I have literally tried for 5 hours to wash just 10 t-shirts on normal wash and keep getting an LE error. Too heavy of a load. I tried for 5 hours straight. I am returning this piece of junk first thing in the morning and will never buy anything LG again. I DO NOT RECOMMEND!

Name: David Almilli
Review: Requires too many permissions that are not necessary to the functioning of the app. The app doesn't respect my desire to disable location and phone permissions and still let me use it. Why do you need phone permission to get my default language and county? If it's off then ask me for them. Same goes for location. I'm already providing WiFi credentials which should be good enough. Why do you need to be able to track my location the entire time i have the app installed? It makes it unusable.

Name: Militaru Dan
Review: just waiting to end the current cycle for starting another dry cycle so when arriving home all done. Not possible. Remote Start turns itself Off at the end of a cycle in no time. Remote Start fake function. Dry cycles not recognized, not even remaining time.

Name: Lynn Foster
Review: I have tried at least a dozen times in the month since buying my refrigerator just to connect the app, and it gets stuck on "connecting with the product" at 40% EVERY time. My Note8 phone meets all requirements. Very frustrated.

Name: Muhammad Ziad Puri
Review: Paid a premium on the washer dryer combo and extra for the thinq, don't know why this app will not show energy consumption after each cycle. Keeps saying no recent history. 2 stars until it's fixed as I'm assuming it's a global issue. , edit : 28/07/19 , its working well after all these months. re-reviewed !

Name: Mohan Dasaratha Rao
Review: I find much convenient

Name: Rudy Reindl
Review: Just purchased a brand new washer/dryer combo. NFC registration doesn't work on either machine. I have a phone with NFC (GALAXY S7). Audible chime from the machine when touching my phone to tag on area but nothing happens. Fake feature.

Name: Jeremy Buchmann
Review: Location and phone access should not be required to use this app. If a user denies access to those functions, the rest of the app should still work. This is an indication of poor app design at best, or data harvesting at worst.

Name: April Nurse
Review: I've just used my app for the first time and really enjoyed it. Only thing that could make it better is to allow access to change some of the settings. my favorite is the text I get when my washer load is complete.

Name: Ami StuntMan
Review: This latest update has been draining a lot if battery behind the scenes. Something is running in the background without my permission and knowledge so i had to disable it - now my phone is back to normal battery life. Poor job by LG. Does not deserve any stars!

Name: Alazmy
Review: It would be an awesome feature if you add an option to control multiple devices simultaneously with the same command, this is specially advantageous with multiple ac units in an apartment, so you can set a certain temperature for them all at once with just one command.

Name: Dale Preston
Review: Uninstalled immediately because why would my washing machine need access to my microphone, my camera, my address book, my phone logs? Pure spyware. This LG washer was a serious mistake because it never uses enough water to even cover the clothes. If they have location then why would they need phone access to know my country? In fact, why do they need location to know where I am? All they need is to know is if my washing machine is connected to WiFi. I don't believe at all what they said.

Name: Kyle Murphy
Review: Terrible. My *terrible* LG fishwasher is broken... again. And this app wants location permission, permission to make phone calls, and access to my contacts list just so it can tell me what a two digit error code means. Sorry, not letting you track everything I do and everyone I know in perpetuity just so I can eat off of a clean plate. Pound sand, LG

Name: A Google user
Review: after developer reply: thanks I am aware of the functionality but reviewed it in the hope you expand functionality slow app , limited functionality, it turns off few seconds after cycle is completed disconnecting the appliance from the app completely so won't be able check status anymore

Name: Jeff Audlee
Review: When I initially connected the app to my washer and dryer, the connection process worked fine. After about a year of it working, I changed my home wifi system and now only the dryer will connect. Uninstalling and reinstalling the app does nothing.

Name: Will Brewer
Review: Pretty useless app if the appliance gets disconnected. Have to enable Remote connect every time you power the appliance. Takes less time to select a cycle and walk away. Then to check back later and find the wireless disconnect so you cant receive updates.

Name: David Duarte
Review: clogged whole house filter caused the washer to stop and throw an error code. Instead of having to search the internet for answers, LG SmartThinQ did it for me. Even though i pretty much over what the problem was, if i hasn't, the app makes it easy to solve problems with the Smart Diagnosis feature.

Name: Steve Poitras
Review: This app is the next coolest thing . So awesome . Just love it!!!

Name: PhuÃÅc TriÃÄnh Phan
Review: I hate app always request enable Bluetooth.

Name: Bo McCormick
Review: The app is a good idea, but is not easy to use. You have to be at the machines to turn them on anyway. The preloaded cycles are very generic and hard to customize. There is not a "create your own" cycle.

Name: Erik Madson
Review: so far, a few days in, this seems like a really nice, while straightforward, smart app device. were using it for a window ac unit. im excited to see how to make the household more efficient this summer.

Name: Rebecca Norton
Review: It's ok. My pair isn't wi-fi. They're just "smart diagnosis" capable, so it's a bit misleading. That said, mine are brand new so I haven't needed a diagnosis, but if either messes up, it'll be interesting to see if this aids in fixing an issue.

Name: varun godavarti
Review: it would be good if it shows the present temperature inside the fridge...the temperature control works fine.but the inside present temperature is not indicated anywhere..thats a disappointment...my samsung refrigerator used to display the inside present temperature..

Name: Razvan Toma
Review: Push notifications don't work for a washing machine even though everything is connected properly.  I can see the time remaining, the current cycle and so on but no notification is sent when the washing machine finishes the cycle.

Name: Daniel Cogny
Review: Crappy update, it was working fine but this latest update starts the Bluetooth without asking and for a reason yet to be known. It also keeps throwing a "network inestability" error and shutting down the app... completely useless as of now.

Name: Wojciech Bednarski
Review: Not possible to share a device with another user.

Name: Jim Craig
Review: Took awhile to connect but all good.thanks.

Name: Donte
Review: Very cool app. Did think I needed an apl for my refrigerator but started having issues with slow ice. come to find out, it was too much water in the system. drained water and it is working again. very cool tech.

Name: Robert Ciepiela
Review: It only tells you when my wash is done. I have to turn in this list remote start every time in the washer to have it work. When my wash is done, it would be useful to turn it on again especially if I'm not gonna be back for a few hours

Name: Rene Torop
Review: Forced to use this app to download custom programmes to my washer dryer but the ingenious developers haven't included the basic info of the different programmes available, e.g the temperature of the downloaded programme+the app doesn't work quite often, really disappointed in LG, won't buy any of their products in the future.

Name: Jim Simons
Review: Pretty good start. Getting better. App should know what filters I use and at least have a link to purchase them. I also get an email when I need filters and that does tell me what filters they are. Otherwise a pretty solid app.

Name: Levente F√°bi√°n
Review: Unfortunatelly I can't connect to the Google Assistant, because it's not allowed in Hungary. I don't understand, because it's can connect with other smart home apps, so I believe something wrong with the SmartThinq app. Please fix it, thanks

Name: W.P.Dhilusha Perera
Review: my air conditioner is S3-Q18KL1DC. 70% energy saving model. but in your app there is no Energy Ctrl. button option? Mode button options are limited in app. room temperature value is different compare with remote control.ü§î give us a quick update again...

Name: MrPaulR
Review: Keeps me on my toes about what my going wrong. It's nice to be proactive with appliances üòäüòäüòä

Name: Gene Fedorko
Review: I have a brand new refrigerator and I keep getting "The registration process failed while communicating with our system".  Would you like to try again? I tried again multiple times.  Still doesn't work.  I wish LG would fix this.

Name: A Google user
Review: I can get it to work fine with my washing machine but disappointed the additional downloads are just the same washing programmes that are preloaded in the machine. A good idea but could be much better with more choice of washes.

Name: Marlito De Assis Moreira
Review: App used to work fine with all the options to adjust temperature setitngs etc for my AC portable unit. now you can only turn it on and off. can't adjust anything. worked fine first 6 months. why update an app that waa working fine? I own a NOTE9 so I know its not my phone.

Name: Lizel Snyman
Review: The app was working and then just stopped working! I don't receive any notifications anymore when the washing machine finished it's cycle and there's  no device usage history or energy monitoring information available anymore. Can this problem be resolved?

Name: Balaji Venkataraman
Review: This is one useless App. Bought a brand new refrigerator which has the SmartThinq function and was unable to register the appliance. Fails to register after reaching 90%.   LG you need rethink how to do the IOT device registrations properly.

Name: Shanaka De Alwis
Review: Cannot connect to Google Home in Sri Lanka. It says your country is not supported. If the product is sold I Sri Lanka how come it's not supported for this feature. Bought the AC due to Wifi feature if it does not fully support purpose lost.

Name: VEERU V
Review: App is simple to use but menu items are not self explanatory. Especially the ice functionality is not clear. In-app help or link to YouTube video explaining the product function and app usage could help the user a lot.

Name: Robert Demanawa
Review: Makes our washing and cleaning of various type of fabrics easier and economical though the apps report on energy consumption did not indicate the unit and value of energy usage. Kindly fix and update the apps for more useful data tracking of energy consumption.

Name: BRYAN G
Review: I bought this product specifically for the WIFI option. Now it doesn't even connect anyone and says I have to use the LG wifi connection??!! How can I use something I don't even have the password for since it's not my wifi domain name??!!!! VERY VERY disappointed in this product

Name: Terrence Qualls
Review: would be great but I'm unable to connect my dryer to this app any assistance would be greatly appreciated...Works perfectly with my Washer and the refrigerator

Name: Kazimiera Biel-Janik
Review: Works excellent, very handy!

Name: David Coleman
Review: App works as intended. Good job Devs

Name: Vince Wood
Review: I do like the convenience, but remote operation seems to be limited to rather basic functions. Haven't downloaded any cycles yet, so I'm hoping that will add more control.

Name: Ramakrishnan Nagarajan
Review: Setting it up was easy, but it takes a bit of time to display wash information. Will wait for a few days and see. Update: though not very user-friendly, it helps in coming up with a wash cycle of it own.

Name: Don Noriega
Review: I only use the app to control and monitor our A/C unit. I am able to turn it on and off, and create a schedule for its operation, all through the app while we're away. I can also see our unit's energy consumption.

Name: ÊûóÂø†Ëºùÿ≥ŸÑŸäŸÖÿßŸÜ ŸÖŸáÿØŸä
Review: Bought a new fridge.. WiFi connected well and all.. only problem I have is.. on my phone it says 4 farenheit.. on the fridge it shows 4degree celcius.. I'm sure a simple update can fix this issue.. there's no farenheit to Celsius setting in the app.. include that please

Name: Vibhanshu Chaturvedi
Review: It turns on the bluetooth of my phone for no reason. Whenevet I start this app it first turns on the bluetooth. what does it need bluetooth for? Thanks for your response. But still can you please why it needs to turn the bluetooth on at first place.

Name: Michel x
Review: unable to launch the application. restriction no rooted phones. please remove the restriction asap! thanks (update: even banks allowing to run application on rooted smart phones so now allowing to use the app should be decission of the customer and not the vendor!). Not happy!

Name: born2fly145
Review: Can't access 5G networks? Can't use special characters in a network name? So I'm supposed to rename my network and change all the 20 other appliances in my house that can and already do connect to my network with a period in the name?

Name: CV Sayani
Review: can't do much with it. you can just download cycles that you can set yourself anyway without the long process of tag on. if I could control the appliance remotely, that would be useful.

Name: martin mccurdy
Review: why cant I register washing machine with nfc, only wifi products. I wish companies would stand by there products instead of taking features away once you've had them for a while... I know this when I put the the phone with nfc enabled to the machine the makes a noise but the does nothing..app doesn't recognize it.

Name: Oli Kingwell
Review: Waste of time. The google assistant integration is woeful and forces you to go through lg thinkq's own ai which cant even turn the tv on! And when it does work, be prepared to wait 30 seconds for a channel change.

Name: Gary Trithart
Review: Everything is great about the app although I never did get the smart diagnosis to work where you hold your phone close to the logo. I eventually did get it to work through the Wi-Fi though

Name: Chris
Review: Handy for controlling my air conditioner but it is so slow. After opening the app it takes 30 sec before I can click on the air conditioner. It's way faster to get off my butt and walk to the AC!

Name: Michael Lee
Review: Utterly terrible. My F4J8FH2W claims to be WiFi enabled, but the instructuons in the manual are SO poor, and the device registration wizard in the app describe buttons and options that dont exist. I was litterally shouting with frustration trying to use this.

Name: Sathatine La Rogue
Review: very helpful although the ability to make a fully customized wash dry cycle would be nice, feels like theres alot of menus to go through. and a written preview of what each wash does settings wise would be nice incase one selects a wash that isnt compatible with certain garments

Name: dave wize
Review: can't even open app. it keeps on saying server failed yo connect.

Name: mateusz jasinski
Review: The slowest app I met in smart home category. It takes around minute to connect to device using this app

Name: Julia Martini
Review: Hard to connect appliances

Name: Courtney Cammarota
Review: Constantly have to reinstall because it can't connect to my TV.

Name: Milagros Rivera
Review: Love it. Don't have to keep time.

Name: Greg Reynolds
Review: Won't complete registration and contradicts itself on status. Says devices are registered and then throws an error saying devices couldn't register. Endless loop of trying to set up devices that I can see on my account online.

Name: Ryan Parrish
Review: You'll never actually use this app unless you live in an LG branded smart home, and even then you'll probably never touch this app. Even if you do, it would take less time to replace every appliance you own than it would for this app to finish loading.

Name: Mike Mcgregor
Review: I have 2 Lg appliances that are smart. one with the NFC tag, and my dishwasher has wifi. followed the instructions in the manual. but neither one will connect. lg offers no support, and it seems almost all comments online say they can't connect also.

Name: Katie Clark
Review: I read the poor reviews while downloading the app and immediately deleted it. Apparently the app is as half cocked as the stupid "smart" washer that won't let me wash my clothes as I see fit. Why do I need a remote start anyway when I don't have an ai to load my washer for me. I might as well hit the start button while I'm there...

Name: sourav majee
Review: The app is super buggy as well as it lags like hell. Smart diagonosis for AC does not work most of the time. A multinational compnay LG cannot construct a app is really unbelievable. Thats why they never got succes in android mobile phone.

Name: John Stokes
Review: Can't get past wifi setup

Name: Pradip Nagarkar
Review: Hello LG team, I purchased 9kg washing machine it is in-built Wi-Fi function for connecting mobile for operating system but my mobile is not connecting to the machine due non availability of the NFC, So LG team, it is possible to connect all types of mobiles whitout NFC Function, Please update soon. Thanks

Name: A Google user
Review: Not much use for this app. To boot it no longer communicates with my washer and dryer. When I first got them in February I could use the diagnostics and program cycles. Now it does nothing with Android 9.

Name: Eddy Hidayat
Review: Not able to link this account with Google Home. Kept getting error message, "Couldn't update the setting. Check your internet connection". It's a smooth integration with Samsung SmartThings and DLink.

Name: Girish Ram
Review: Wish the app was capable of detecting the fridge being in demo mode. My fridge (floor model) was in demo mode and the app did not detect or mention that the unit is in demo mode. The app needs more work in my opinion.

Name: Susie Mont
Review: Hopeless... Trying to hook up my TV to Alexa, after registering on this app it says my TV won't be on the dashboard... DUH! If its not on the dashboard how in gods name am I meant to select it!!!!!!!!!

Name: Kevin wess
Review: so far this works great. love how it sends you a notification when the washer and/ or dryer is done and shows how much time is remaining. my washer and dryer is in the garage

Name: Trever Mohammed
Review: Doesn't work with android phone with latest OS for their laundry system with the "tag on". went through all the troubleshooting options. This app WILL work flawlessly with my wife's LG phone.... Just not with my android phone

Name: Batin Meadows
Review: This may be the worst app that I've used in my smart home journey. It's super disappointing, and I may have purchased a different washer and dryer set entirely had I known how terrible the process would be. LG makes phones, but can't make a sensible wifi connection process?

Name: pete petrass
Review: app is very intuitive and easy to use. connection instructions were a bit vague but once that was done all good. probably the only issue is you cannot turn the machines on remotely

Name: Phuong Nguyen
Review: this app won't link to Google home, I can't get pass the sign in page (using the Google account)

Name: Jim Sekoulidis
Review: Love the instant updates.

Name: Chin Yong
Review: Can't turn on appliances from off state

Name: PT Curtiss
Review: Seems to work well. No complaints.

Name: Christopher Gardiner
Review: This app cannot trigger Google Assistant (GA) to inform the house when a wash is done. GA can, however, start a wash if it is set up for a remove start. IFTTT doesn't see the washer at all. Rediculous.

Name: Andy Da Dragoon
Review: It won't connect via wifi. I tried for a few hours and used the customer support, but they were no help. I guess I really don't need to monitor anything on it... So much for it being a smart appliance...

Name: Timothy Goughnour
Review: It took some time to figure out how to actually get the app to communicate with the refrigerator, but got a lot of useful statistical data to help me reduce thw annual cost associated with the operation of my smartfridge!

Name: Yan Khor
Review: The apps doesn't work properly after updated it this morning. Unable to use the apps to control the washer/connection. I had tried to logout and re-login, still the same. Please advise. Thanks.

Name: Geoff Cavender
Review: app worked well, but recent update added location and call permissions, contacts etc... since I won't allow this, it's become worthless... there would have to be very compelling reasons for me to allow these new requirements... too invasive, removing app.

Name: C Nakai
Review: Update broke this app. It used to work perfectly. Update uninstalled washer and dryer, and now won't sync both on the same account. I am not gping to create two accounts. This app update sucks!!!! oh yeah, this is on an LG G6 android phone

Name: Dale
Review: Why does this app need permission to make phone calls, Yeah right I don't think so. And our brand new washing machine is already having problems and it's only 5 weeks old, last LG product I'll be looking at!

Name: Andreas Mortin
Review: Will not run on Sony Xperia XZ1 w Oreo - Says phone is root:ed Will not run on Sony Z3 Compact tablet - Not compatible Will run on a very old Samsung phone though  Need permissions that makes no sense - if you do not grant all permissions the app wont even try to start.

Name: Timon Kanters
Review: No TV support. The link provided in the response also does not help. The "Set Up TV for the Google Assistant" option is not available on the TV and LG refuses to connect my TV to Google Assistant due to lack of support in my country.

Name: A Google user
Review: I wanted to use the NFC based smart functionality of my washer. The price to pay: LG account or Google/Facebook sign in, location, call, and media access for the 70+ MB monster of an app. Not worth it. Immediate uninstall.

Name: Brent Bueche
Review: Love the app but the latest update crashes on my Android--starts to open but then crashes and shuts down so I have to give it a zero rating at this point.  The earlier versions all worked fine.

Name: Paul Koenig
Review: little bit awkward. cant set orogram remote - nothing. all it does it turn appliance on/off, give status on how long remaining and start diagnosis in case of machine errors. expected more.

Name: Vojtech Jakl
Review: requires permission to make calls, unacceptable for info about my country is not really needed, moreovere, it can be determined without reading my SIM if needed. requires logon to cloud for simple control of local devices. multiple usage of prefabricated responses shows lack of interest on the side of LG.

Name: Roxas
Review: I can't get my wi-fi to work on my fridge, i dont understand why it has to be so complicated for no reason, i press and hold the wi-fi button for 3 seconds, and nothing happens on my app, the wi-fi icon is just blinking on the fridge

Name: Joe
Review: Its stupid that we not only have to surrender location and phone access but ALSO need to create an account just to diagnose our appliances.

Name: Skye Fentras
Review: Doesn't work on a rooted device. I wonder why :)

Name: Erling Maqe
Review: i use this couple time, and this must have contain a lot of capabilities, because it has over 180MB of data. i use this only for my washing machine, hard to connect.

Name: Rene Letoile
Review: was working well at the start notifications came as they should but lately they seem to be a few hours late. I did get a notification about an update I'm sure that will fix this issue.

Name: Tito Alo
Review: Showing the content of downloadable wash program would be a more than welcome addition. Having to download the program to the machine to know how it's configured is really annoying. Please change that.

Name: Dave Ewing
Review: Would not recognize my LG account ID and password. Then I tried logging in using Google it popped out and asked me to log in with Google. Trying to interact with my LG range/oven but this app different work for me yet.

Name: Jennifer Thibodeaux
Review: I use this app at least 2 times a month to reset my LG Refrigerator/Freezer. If you leave the doors open to long, the ice maker stops making ice until you reset it with the app.

Name: B Grover
Review: Overlying complicated to connect my washer and dryer to my wifi and to the app. The app provides hardly any useful features..only nice thing is that it will send you a push message when your wash or dryer cycle is done.

Name: A Google user
Review: The app looks like a good idea but in my case using it with the washer and dryer the app doesn't let my change options. I can just choose the Cycle but I can't modified any of the settings (temperature, soil level, spin, etc)

Name: JTJY
Review: Horrible software and development team. What were they thinking when they tried to integrate everything into a single app? Instead of adding functions they removed most of it I actually used rendering my "smart appliances" dumb

Name: napple s77
Review: Great app but I just want to spin and nothing else, can't find this function.

Name: Roger Craig
Review: LG, or current users, can someone please tell me the default WIFI PW when setting up A/C window unit? it was deleted in error. I tried the last 4 characters of name but no go...Update, it has been weeks and no reply.

Name: V. Gaiii J.
Review: used to work great until latest update. I cant connect to the device after the latest update. and it always turn on bluetooth automatically. These days the app sucks, couldn't even open the app.

Name: Mitchell Baird
Review: Big app. Requires permissions to be granted or else it will not start, nothing graceful about that. A bit of hassle to go through just to use a gimmick on my washing machine.

Name: A Google user
Review: Great app! Really love it, works perfectly with my dishwasher, range, fridge and a microwave. Also have Samsung's washer and a dryer and their app is simply horrendous. Great job LG!

Name: Christina Miles
Review: It was hard to connect the washer with the app. However, now it works great. I would just advise you to take your time connecting your appliance with the app.

Name: Charles Abdallah
Review: LG washer, I seem to only have the option to turn it off when it's finished it's cycle, I can't seem to start another cycle immediately. if I have it on a wash and dry cycle, but I know everything won't be dry, I can't start another dry cycle. only turn off the machine

Name: Gavin D
Review: great app. let's you know when laundry is finished. or you can preload and start remotely. if AC is off, you can turn it on, when you're on your way home from work, so upon your arrival it's nice and cool. good job LG

Name: Adds !
Review: Functionality needs to improve

Name: G H
Review: The app requires too many intrusive permissions. Why does it need access to make calls, or to my location and personal information? I wanted to see how it would work with LG products that I was interested in buying, however I didn't make it past the login screen, as didn't want to sign up.

Name: Jeff Morrison
Review: Seems to take forever to update when you check to see what cycle it's on. Also you can't use the app if you haven't physically turned on the dishwasher first which seems a bit silly.

Name: Bo Drayton
Review: Buggy and most features are almost useless for washer and dryers. Only useful for notification of completed cycle and for tracking # of times apliance used per month. Would be awsome if it just had remote restart dryer steam refresh and multi-user/multi-phone/multi-login support.

Name: Andrei Dragan
Review: This app is awesome. i can control my fridge and washer with it and it works perfectly. Connectiom could be faster but i can't complain right now.

Name: Shrikant Tikam
Review: It would be more interactive if you give more control on all washing cycle parametrers to make our choice for customized washing cycle..LG should provide us all control right from Wash Spin Temperature and Speed..Its basic now..Give us pro version of this app..

Name: Robert Stuart
Review: I like the new LG laundry pair, but for a company that makes tech products this is the worst IoT connected app I've used to date. The washer will not stay connected, and after many complaints about the same issue, no update from LG. Disappointing.

Name: Jeff Folgate
Review: garbage app. can't even log in to begin using this app. Help references say to uninstall and reinstall. did that three times. same "failure to connect to server" message. not worth the frustration.

Name: Eli Baikie
Review: the app is okay, the washing machine is awful, no spin only cycle, the display isnt standard 7-segment, its some strange 12-segment display ams i often have no idea what number it's trying to display.

Name: Jonathan Mactal
Review: Quite useful but very very slow! It takes almost 30 seconds to see the status of a connected device, and in some instances, it times out. Quite unreliable if you ask me.

Name: Ayush Awasthi
Review: Makes life easy, you can easily find out error just by using simple app

Name: Stephanie Woodside
Review: Nice to have remote start and monitoring, but I can't use the customizing options through remote start that I can directly on my washer and dryer. You can't monitor status unless you use remote start.

Name: Frank_K
Review: More trouble than its worth. Deleted after the first use when it was apparent that it wouldn't let me make specific settings that I could make from the washer's control panel. Worthless!

Name: Elmer Croan
Review: Great first version, and performs the essentials nicely. The user interface could use some small amount of improvement, but overall a great priduct.

Name: Evan Cooper
Review: There's no TV option even though all the tutorials online say to add the TV through the app to control it through Alexa. The customer service team I called 3 times didn't even know what an Alexa was.

Name: A Google user
Review: i love this convenient way to diagnose issues with my new 3 month old refrigerator. great technology. just wish i didn't have to use it 3 months after purchasing a LG french door refrigerator after paying so much for it üòû

Name: True Blue
Review: As others. After latest update I am no longer receiving a notification after end of cycle. Worked fine before. You can open app and still see washer, time remaining etc. Please fix! Thank you

Name: Chris Gorski

Review: Using with a combo washer dryer. 1. Need hacker skills to even register the product. 2. when connected, i can only see the settings i chose MANUALLY on the machine by turning the program selector and pushing the buttons 3. no option to select and CHANGE washing program parameters within the app 4. not possibly to save my CUSTOM program settings as favourites 5. only ONE program to be downloaded at once?? 6. why do i need to see the accu.weather forecast on half of the app screen? 7. remote start with the app makes no sense, as you have to set everything manually anyway, and so you can just use the delay function button on the machine instead. 8. how to turn off the wifi on the washing machine? i don't need it anymore, but it keeps connecting, and pressing the wifi button for even 3 sec does nothing.  All you can do with this app is just to see (not change) the program you set manually, start the washing remotely (if can't calculate the delay in advance), and turn off the machine.  2019 not smart app.

Name: John Warenda
Review: Well, LG, I've long been satisfied with your products, but as you've now joined the bandwagon of companies enforcing root-bans on products which aren't even impacted by root access, you've lost a customer. I'm a tech professional and enthusiast. I'm not breaking any laws, defrauding any companies, or misusing any products. Root access isn't any indication that I might be. Worst of all even if those things were true, it wouldn't even be relevant to your product, so the only logical takeaway from you blocking root users is that you just don't want our business. Well, congratulations, your wish is granted. I'm no longer a customer, and as a tech professional, I'll stop recommending your products for institutional use.

Review: This app is responsive and does what it says. Very happy. I use the app for a washer dryer and tv. Compared to a previous Hoover washer dryer and their app (it was awful) I would never go back. I can ask it to do something and it just gets on with it. I would add though that they need to simplify the initial pairing to the app with the washer dryer. Harder than it needed to be. All fine since of course!

Name: Gaby Mayo
Review: Update 2: emailed as suggested below, after a week one reply came, promptly responded to, and now nothing after another few weeks. Terrible customer service. Update: Verfication email came through aaprox 4 hours later, by which time the link did not work. Have attempted to resend now multiple times but no email coming through again - still 1 Star! Verification email does not come through. Attempted 4 times now, but can't verify my new account so cannot use the app with my new LG gear

Name: Pierre Louis TODESCO
Review: Finally the compatibility with Google is there! The bad point remain that only few useless parameters are available. I was expecting at least two real temperature (fridge and freezer) with display between selected and real. ON & OFF timing (Graph) of the compressor related to the ambient (local weather) would be also a good point to determine the influence of the selected temperature versus the consumption of the device.

Name: Jeff Russell
Review: Previous issue with the app being unstable is fine. However, all I am able to do now is put in pre-set washer profiles as opposed to having any real control over how the washer runs. Tried to uninstall and reinstall, but it continuously forced my phone to restart. Couldn't get the app open once. I miss your old laundry app.

Name: Wesley Fan
Review: PERMISSIONS! Not only can I not put the setting in my dryer manually (for example theres no way for me to use ultra low and damp dry) but they make me download the app which apparently needs location information and to access my calls? The location settings have NOTHING to do with connecting bluetooth to the dryer and im not giving your app access to my phone and contacts. Theres ZERO reason for this. Their dish washers are also terrible. Its like they dont even try out their products beforehand

Review: Updated review. App is painfully slow, so slow that you can't use with Google home because it thinks it's unresponsive, this is unacceptable. Plus with the latest version fan speed no longer stays illuminated so you don't know what settings it's on and at the bottom where additional settings are it just has "@AC_MAIN_WIND_MODE" on the button. This is why I don't purchase LG products anymore because their app is rubbish. I have deleted and reinstalled that many times I've lost count.

Name: Marcos Castillo
Review: Very slow "Checking product status" when the app is starting. You have to wait around 20 seconds to find the device to be able turn it on. NOTE: My internet is very fast and the devices are receiving excellent WiFi signal. Device: LG Air Conditioner

Name: Nelson Phillips
Review: Garbage. On the rare occasion I can pair the app with the air conditioner, the connection only lasts a few hours. It then always tells me the AC is powered off, though it's on. Then we start the fiasco all over again with reinstalling the app. Worse than useless. July 18 update: Was promised by LG rep (see below) that an update to fix these issues would be ready by the end of June... Never happened. Why am I not surprised?

Name: A Google user
Review: Been using air conditioner for a year and it still constantly disconnects from strong wifi signal. App is so laggy that it is a nuisance to use.

Name: Kevin Julius
Review: This APP is BROKEN!!!! Needs fixing ASAP the app before this update worked perfect!!! I will be calling LG for resolution!!! As of 6/2019 the previous issues with this app have been resolved and the app is running great now.

Name: David Parsons
Review: Doesn't work. Fails in a different way on 3 phones I've tried it on. My NFC works perfectly but won't work with this app. Total garbage.

Name: Tim G
Review: Refuses to run on my rooted phone. Why?? This phone only comes rooted!  Everything else works, why not LG's app?? UPDATE: LG apologizes but won't fix. Meh. I got app working anyway using XPosed Framework and RootCloak module, so I guess we all win some. Now, will wait to see if this half-baked app will actually link with my LG product once it arrives tomorrow! If not, I'll be sorry I even bought it!!  UPDATE: Still love my (manually operated) LG air conditioner, but HATE the fact that LQ refuses to fix this problem. They should warn potential customers BEFORE purchase that their smart app is hobbled in this way. Installing Magisk (and using its "Hide" feature) bought me some time, during which SmartThinq ran, but then the app again disabled itself. BOO!

Name: Brian Fitzpatrick
Review: This app typically works well, although there is the occasional failure to connect to our upstairs heat pump unit.

Mine says "won't work on a rooted phone" and my phone isn't rooted. So there is clearly an error coding, morons. Name: Moxxie Ann
Review: 4 months after being talked into believing LG now made quality, my smart fridge is error coding, the app was a pain and when was prompted to call an operator, they stated were sending a repair guy out,And they would be in touch. still waiting, it's still not working, just leaking

Name: David Sacerdote
Review: While the initial version of the app couldn't run at all on my phone, LG eventually shipped a working version of the app after about six weeks. This was really annoying because they intentionally broke the predecessor app, so features weren't available in that time. The updated app (12/16/2016) still asks for way too many permissions, like access to my contacts list, and access to my SMS messages, and requires that you agree to a long and legalese-filled terms of use and privacy policy. Both the long list of permissions and the crazy legalese are completely unacceptable, so this app will not get to live on any phone of mine. 11/22/2018 app refuses to run without unreasonable permission requests. Washing machine control doesn't need permission to send my photos to the manufacturer.

Name: Fiat R.
Review: Change the alerts to standard Android notifications! The alert popup takes  over the screen interrupting other apps even if do not disturb is enabled. There should be an option to use Android's standard notification alerts that sit in the notification tray.  Funny how LG comments about valuing feedback, but does nothing to implement basic features. I've seen others comment  as well. Avoid LG products all together.

Name: Carmen C
Review: Another update: If you have a pedestal washer, you have to press and hold the "Warm Water" button for Smart Diagnosis, not "Tub Clean" as directed by the app. Hopefully that helps another user. Previous review: A year later this app is still worse than the old one was for my LG washer. The old app had laundry stats, features, explanations of downloadable cycles. (Even the paper manual contains basic info on the standard cycles. Why wouldn't you offer some explanation as to what a cycle actually does, not just what LG thinks it will be good for?). This app is missing necessary functions and information. It's sparse. And just not up to par with other current apps for smart products. LG, why won't you give this app the same functionality for washing machines as the old app had?

Name: Joel Guay
Review: Keeping saying my AC isn't connected or just stay in "getting data" status.... After Multiple link unlink, uninstall, install, it became stable after a day or two...
